content.approach: This website compiles information from peer-reviewed academic sources, government archives, and established educational institutions. Primary sources (Rizal's original writings, Spanish colonial records) are cross-referenced with scholarly interpretations from reputable university presses and recognized historians.
content.verification: All content is verified against multiple authoritative sources including the National Historical Commission of the Philippines, University of the Philippines Press publications, and international academic journals. Claims are supported by documented evidence from the academic bibliography listed above.
content.source_hierarchy: Priority is given to: (1) Primary sources and government archives, (2) Peer-reviewed academic publications, (3) Established university press books, (4) Recognized historical institutions. Information from less authoritative sources is clearly marked and cross-verified.
content.limitations: Some early biographical details rely on family accounts and may contain elements of hagiography. Modern scholarship questions certain traditional narratives. Where scholarly debate exists, multiple perspectives are presented with attribution to specific sources.
content.updates: Information is regularly updated as new scholarship emerges. Recent historical revisionist work from reputable academic sources has been incorporated where appropriate. All new information is verified against established academic standards before inclusion.

content.message: If you believe any information on this website is incorrect or not true, please contact the makers of this site so we can review and correct it as soon as possible. All content is sourced from the academic materials listed above.
